Package edu.pdx.cs410J.cox

Class PhoneBill

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.pdx.cs410J.AbstractPhoneBill<PhoneCall>
      • edu.pdx.cs410J.cox.PhoneBill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class PhoneBill
extends AbstractPhoneBill<PhoneCall>
    This class represents a phone bill. It is descended from the AbstractPhoneBill class. It implements AbstractPhoneBill's abstract classes : addPhoneCall, getCustomer, and getPhoneCalls. The following classes are specific to PhoneBill (not inherited): setCustomer. Variables: calls: Contains all of the calls made from this account. customer: Contains the name of the customer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPhoneCall​(PhoneCall call)
      This Method accepts a PhoneCall object, which it adds to the existing collection of PhoneCalls.
      java.lang.String getCustomer()
      This method returns string containing the name of the customer whose PhoneBill it is.
      java.util.Collection<PhoneCall> getPhoneCalls()
      This method returns all of the calls that have taken place for this customer.
      void setCustomer​(java.lang.String name)
      This method accepts a string containing the name of the customer whose PhoneBill it is.

        public void addPhoneCall​(PhoneCall call)
        This Method accepts a PhoneCall object, which it adds to the existing collection of PhoneCalls.
        Specified by:
        addPhoneCall in class AbstractPhoneBill<PhoneCall>
        Parameters:
        call - A PhoneCall object which will be added to the collection variable, calls.

      • getCustomer

        public java.lang.String getCustomer()
        This method returns string containing the name of the customer whose PhoneBill it is.
        Specified by:
        getCustomer in class AbstractPhoneBill<PhoneCall>
        Returns:
        A string which contains the name of the customer who pays the bill.

      • getPhoneCalls

        public java.util.Collection<PhoneCall> getPhoneCalls()
        This method returns all of the calls that have taken place for this customer.
        Specified by:
        getPhoneCalls in class AbstractPhoneBill<PhoneCall>
        Returns:
        A collection of PhoneCall instances which hold the information regarding the calls that have taken place.

      • setCustomer

        public void setCustomer​(java.lang.String name)
        This method accepts a string containing the name of the customer whose PhoneBill it is.
        Parameters:
        name - A string containing the name of the customer who pays the bill.
